The Regional Distri…
column3:
"Evacuation alerts have expanded in the Similkameen for areas near the volatile Cool Creek wildfire.

The Regional District of Okanagan-Similkameen has issued a new alert for 82 properties in rural Keremeos and an area west of the Lower Similkameen Indian Band." #LSIB #BCWildfire https://t.co/kt5WGiliGM
